SELECT REPORT_REVIEW_NO, REPORT_TYPE_NAME,
CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE - REPORT_REVIEW_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - REPORT_REVIEW_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - REPORT_REVIEW_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - REPORT_REVIEW_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - REPORT_REVIEW_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - REPORT_REVIEW_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(REPORT_REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS REPORT_REVIEW_DATE
, MEMBER_NAME, REPORT_REVIEW_FL FROM "REPORT_REVIEW" JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN "REPORT_TYPE" USING (REPORT_TYPE_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "REPORT_REVIEW" JOIN
"REPORT_TYPE" USING (REPORT_TYPE_NO)
"MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO)
WHERE
REPORT_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
REPORT_REVIEW_NO LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
